Klasemen Sementara Liga Premier

Jadwal Pertandingan Premier League 2020/2021 diawali 12 September 2020 dan berakhir pada 23 Mei 2021.Berikut adalah tabelklasemen sementara, update terbaru Live Score,disertai dengan daftar Top Score.

Sumber: https://www.bbc.com/sport/football/tables
Last updated 17th April 2021 at 14:14

```{r}
dtf<- read.table(file="epl.csv", header =TRUE, sep = ",")
dtf[1:1] <- list(NULL)
print (dtf)
```

Legenda
P   : Played
W   : Won
F   : For
A   : Against
GD  : GD
Pts : Points
Form: Form

```{r}
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
barplot(dtf[, "Pts"],
        # ubah warna ouline menjadi steelblue
        border="steelblue",
        # ubah wana box
        col= c("grey", "yellow", "steelblue", "green", "orange"),
        # ubah nama grup dari A sampai E
        names.arg = LETTERS[1:20],
        # ubah orientasi menajadi horizontal
        horiz=TRUE)
```
